questions.question: Which of the following grants a professional the right to practice a given profession:

choices.answer: A professional license
Honesty
Integrity
Code of ethics

questions.question: Treating students equally without regard to ability, race, or ethnicity represents this aspect of the code of ethics for

choices.answer: Commitment to the profession
Conduct with students
Conduct with parents and communities
Conduct with colleagues

questions.question: A teacher should ________________ deny a student access to diverse points of view.

choices.answer: Never
Always
Sometimes
Occasionally
Industry practices or standards
Religious beliefs.
Morals or personal beliefs.
All of the above

questions.question: A code of ethics must do all of the following except:

choices.answer: Effectively communicate acceptable values to all members
Reflects only legal standards of conduct for individuals and the organizati
Provides a method to monitor and discipline members of the organization
Communicate the organization's value system to outsiders

questions.question: A code of ethical conduct for financial or accounting managers in an organization requires all of the following, except:

choices.answer: Integrity and refusal to compromise professional values
Independence of conflicts of economic interest
Independence from professional conflicts of interest
Subjectivity in the presentation of information, preparation of reports

questions.question: A primary purpose for establishing a code of ethics within an organization is:

choices.answer: Ensure that all members of the profession perform at the same level of comp
Reduce demands on members of the profession for deficient jobs
Promote an ethical culture among professionals who serve others
Require members of the profession to show loyalty in all matters

questions.question: The most important reason for establishing a code of ethics within an organization is that the code:

choices.answer: It is required by the control entities
Have a public relations instrument
Provide indicators for evaluations of the members of the organization
Express individual behavior standards for members of the organization

questions.question: The code of ethics of a professional organization establishes:

choices.answer: Wide standards of conduct for members of a profession
The governance structure of the members of a profession
A list of illegal activities recommended to members of a profession
A unit of measure for the performance of its members

questions.question: A review of an organization's code of ethics revealed that it contained comprehensive guidelines designed to inspire hig

choices.answer: Periodic review and recognition of all employees
Disciplinary measures in case of violation
Participation of all employees in its construction
Public knowledge of its content and purpose
